channel.title: [SHARD] How to change the quest tab?
channel.description:
I am on a Shard base, and I was wondering how to change the quest tab.
To have "Another Slice of H.A.M." (for example) be in the FREE QUESTS area.
How to add custom quests (just the name) not actually making a custom quest, but having a quest in the quest tab called, "helloWorld"
Thanks.

item.title: [SHARD] How to change the quest tab?
item.dc:creator: @TiVo TiVo
item.description:
@TiVo wrote:

Any luck?

Read full topic
item.source: [SHARD] How to change the quest tab?

item.title: [SHARD] How to change the quest tab?
item.dc:creator: @Level_120_Dungeoneer Level 120 Dungeoneering
item.description:
@Level_120_Dungeoneer wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:21, topic:435910”][quote author=arham 4 link=topic=538627.msg3941337#msg3941337 date=1331430814]
OT - Can’t you just search for an item on the quest tab (assuming you have windows 7 and you have search options to look in files)?
[/quote]

You didn’t see my post?[/quote]

Oh I’m so sorry, I didn’t see it. But I have Windows XP.

Read full topic

item.source: [SHARD] How to change the quest tab?

item.title: [SHARD] How to change the quest tab?
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“heatrn11, post:14, topic:435910”][quote author=Daginith link=topic=538627.msg3941330#msg3941330 date=1331430688]

Thanks. I tried PI once, but it was way too messy. Shard is perfect for me.

Anyway, does anyone know how to do this?

we should all join together and make an awesome shard server, since were all experienced with it…even though shard almost made me through my cat down the stairs.

poor kitty.

poor grammar.

What’s wrong with my grammar?

I’m assuming you meant ‘threw’ instead of ‘through’.

No, I meant “through”.

My bad, you meant throw.
Throw means ‘To toss’ (i’m paraphrasing these)
Through means to ‘put inside the wall and come out the other side’.
[/quote]
And now I feel stupid )’=.[/quote]
I’m sometimes grammar Nazi when im bored.

Read full topic
item.source: [SHARD] How to change the quest tab?

[/quote][/quote]

OT - Can’t you just search for an item on the quest tab (assuming you have windows 7 and you have search options to look in files)?
